name: NSCollectionLayoutDimension
desc: An individual dimension representing an item's width or height in a collection view.

items.name: class func absolute(CGFloat) -> Self
items.desc: Creates a dimension with an absolute point value.

items.name: class func estimated(CGFloat) -> Self
items.desc: Creates a dimension with an estimated point value.

items.name: class func fractionalHeight(CGFloat) -> Self
items.desc: Creates a dimension that is computed as a fraction of the height of the containing group.

items.name: class func fractionalWidth(CGFloat) -> Self
items.desc: Creates a dimension that is computed as a fraction of the width of the containing group.

items.name: var dimension: CGFloat
items.desc: The floating-point value of the dimension.

items.name: var isAbsolute: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the dimension is expressed as an absolute value.

items.name: var isEstimated: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the dimension is expressed as an estimated value.

items.name: var isFractionalHeight: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the dimension is expressed as a fraction of its container's height.

items.name: var isFractionalWidth: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the dimension is expressed as a fraction of its container's width.
